exceptions._comment: add promo:false to ALL cards with the intention of deleting them later
Each deck has one primary and two secondary commanders. They also included oversized foil versions of the same.
exceptions.where: title=(Kaalia of the Vast|Oros, the Avenger|Tariel, Reckoner of Souls|    Riku of Two Reflections|Animar, Soul of Elements|Intet, the Dreamer|    Ghave, Guru of Spores|Teneb, the Harvester|Karador, Ghost Chieftain|    Zedruu the Greathearted|Ruhan of the Fomori|Numot, the Devastator|    The Mimeoplasm|Vorosh, the Hunter|Damia, Sage of Stone)

exceptions._comment: delete all cards that still have promo=false, which leaves just our promo cards
